title: Metro.Last.Light.UPDATE.1.0.0.15.Hotfix.2-CPY
description:
U PRESENTS U

Release Name....... Metro.Last.Light.UPDATE.1.0.0.15.Hotfix.2-CPY
Release Date....... 02/08/2014
Shop Release Date..
Format............. Exe
Release............ DOX
Kind............... Update
Protection......... Steam
Files N............ 24x50MB

U INFORMATION U

It Is the Year 2034. Beneath the ruins of post-apocalyptic Moscow,
in the tunnels of the Metro, the remnants of mankind are besieged by
deadly threats from outside and within. Mutants stalk the catacombs
beneath the desolate surface, and hunt amidst the poisoned skies above
But rather than stand united, the station-cities of the Metro are
locked in a struggle for the ultimate power, a doomsday device from
the military vaults of D6. A civil war is stirring that could wipe
humanity from the face of the earth forever
As Artyom, burdened by guilt but driven by hope, you hold the key to
our survival, the last light in our darkest hour

Instructions

- Unrar
- Install the update to your game dir
- Copy the crack
- Play the game

Since we're still good people here the instructions to make the old
savegames work on our release
- Open the dir MyDocuments4A GamesMetro LL and rename the dir
you find into "410000004100000
- Open the dir %LOCALAPPDATA%4A GamesMetro LL and rename the dir
you find into "410000004100000
- Start & Enjoy

Note

Metro.Last.Light.Complete.Edition-PROPHET is required

U GROUP  U

Established in 1999, we are possibly the oldest Italian-based
release group still in activity.  We express a big THANK YOU to
all those friends who helped us in various forms throughout these
years  Don't forget to support the companies and to keep the
Scene about FUN.

Fondato nel 1999, CPY e' probabilmente il piu' vecchio gruppo
release in Italia ancora in attivita'.  Ringraziamo DI CUORE tutti
gli amici che ci hanno aiutati in ogni maniera in questi anni
Ricordate di supportare le compagnie cinematografiche e di
software, e che la Scena dev'essere basata sul DIVERTIMENTO.

Contact: cpyhushmail.com

UU
